direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle one-time transactions but perform different operations (submission vs. status check).
Both methods involve transactions with similar control flows and parameter handling.
Both methods handle mandatory parameters and may throw similar exceptions for missing or invalid inputs.
Both methods access and manipulate asset-related data, though for different purposes.
Both methods modify or query state related to plans or transactions.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the initialization of the RequestHandler for API requests.
Parameter validation is required before submitting a one-time transaction.
Both methods involve verifying transaction statuses and handling similar exceptions.
